name: Base
description: Base scenario with no shocks or adjustments

name: RatePlus50
description: Parallel rate shock of +50 basis points

name: RateMinus100
description: Parallel rate shock of -100 basis points

name: StressScenario
description: Combined stress scenario: rate increase and value decline
